page.description: Perform some action on an item in the Client-side Data Cache (e.g. read the data, refresh the data, etc.).

item.name: Action name
item.description: Specify the Client-side Data Cache Action that you want to execute.

item.name: Data cache items Id(s)
item.description: Specify the data cache items you want to perform an action on. You can enter a comma delimited list of data-items if you want to refresh the data in more than one data-item in a single Ajax callback.

item.name: Data cache items to read
item.description: Data cache items to read property.

item.name: Data cache item to delete
item.description: Specify the name of the Data Cache item to delete (or '<all>' to delete all items). If the item is defined to persist (either in LocalStoragte or the filesystem) and it has been persisted, it will be removed (from either LocalStorage or the filesystem).

item.name: Data item
item.description: Specify the name of the data item you want to read

item.name: Filter
item.description: You can specify a filter expression to filter the data in the data item.

item.name: Order
item.description: You can specify an order expression to order the data in the data item.

item.name: onComplete
item.description: Specify the Javascript to run once all of the data items have been refreshed.

item.name: onComplete
item.description: Specify the Javascript to run once all of the data items have been read.

item.name: onSuccess
item.description: Specify the Javascript to run once the data has been read.

item.name: onSuccess
item.description: Specify the Javascript to run once the action has completed.

item.name: onSuccess
item.description: Specify the Javascript to run once the data has been read.

item.name: onFail
item.description: Specify the Javascript to run if the action fails.
